detail_desc: Wrapover bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with long sleeves and press-studs at the side and crotch.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and tapered legs with ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Scarf in a soft weave with a lightly brushed finish and frayed edges. Size 70x200 cm.
Leggings in jersey made from a soft, organic cotton blend with an elasticated waist. One patterned pair and one pair in a solid colour.
Metal hair grips. Length 5 cm.
5-pocket ankle-length trousers in washed stretch twill with a washed look, high waist, zip fly and slim legs.
Blouse in an airy weave with a collar, buttons down the front and a gathered yoke on the shoulders and at the back. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Top in printed sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined, drawstring hood with a wrapover front. Long sleeves, a kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Calf-length skirt in viscose jersey with a sewn-in wrapover, elasticated waist and slit at the front. Unlined.
Trousers in a crêpe weave with a high, elasticated waist, side pockets and tapered, ankle-length legs. The polyester content of the trousers is partly recycled.
Parka in a woven modal blend with a soft, brushed finish. Hood, zip down the front, side pockets and a drawstring at the waist. Unlined.
Playsuit in soft viscose jersey with narrow shoulder straps, an elasticated seam at the waist and short, wide legs.
Set with a dress and pair of leggings in soft organic cotton jersey. Short-sleeved dress with a gathered seam at the top and gently flared skirt. Leggings with an elasticated waist.

Short-sleeved shirt in a cotton weave with a bow tie or tie. Shirt with a collar, buttons down the front, yoke with a pleat at the back and a rounded hem. Bow tie/tie with an elastic strap and plastic fastener.
Alice bands in various designs: one padded, one satin-covered with plastic beads and one in metal with faceted plastic stones.
Short, fitted, sleeveless dress in a soft rib knit with a deep V-neck front and back and decorative buttons down the front. Unlined.
Long-sleeved jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with sequins on the front and narrow ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Crop tops in soft jersey with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.
Long-sleeved top in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric with a wrapover, jersey-lined hood and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Hat knitted in soft cotton with a faux fur pompom on top, earflaps and ties under the chin.

Padded gilet in a quilted weave with a detachable, lined hood and stand-up collar. Zip down the front with a round tab and chin guard, and pockets in the side seams. Slightly longer and rounded at the back. Lined.
Sports vest top in ribbed fast-drying functional fabric made from recycled polyester with short slits in the sides. Longer at the back.
Strapless playsuit in a viscose weave with elastication and a narrow frill trim at the top. Elasticated seam at the waist and short legs.
Bracelets in various designs, two with elastic and pendants and three in an adjustable length.
Metal watch with an adjustable strap in imitation leather with a metal buckle. Width of strap 2 cm, total length 23 cm. Diameter of watch 4 cm.
Pyjama T-shirt and leggings in soft jersey. T-shirt in a viscose and cotton blend with a print motif on the front. Leggings in patterned cotton with an elasticated waist.
Hipster briefs in jersey made from a cotton blend with lace trims, a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Leggings in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.

Bikini top with a decorative tie detail at the front, lightly padded cups with removable inserts, side support and a silicone trim at the top. Detachable ties at the back of the neck and a fastening at the back.
T-shirt in slub cotton jersey with a chest pocket.
T-shirt in printed jersey.
Long metal earrings with a large hoop pendant. Length 8.5 cm, diameter of pendant 5 cm.
Tights in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
Cargo shorts in a cotton weave with an elasticated, drawstring waist, zip fly, side pockets and flap back and leg pockets with press-studs.
Jumper in a soft, rib knit with a small, ribbed stand-up collar and long sleeves.
Shorts in glossy, pleated jersey with wide, covered elastication at the waist and short, wide legs with laser-cut edges at the hems.
Short top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a decorative knot detail at the front hem. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Soft brushed inside.
Long-sleeved body in ribbed jersey made from a Tencel™lyocell blend with a deep neckline and press-studs at the crotch.
Straight-cut, short-sleeved blouse in an airy cotton weave with a V-neck opening at the top and small stand-up collar with gathers and ties at the front.
Shorts in jersey and sequin-embroidered mesh with a high, elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and short legs.
Sleeveless maxi dress in woven fabric with a sheen. Deep V-neck with inset sections at the front, spaghetti straps that cross at the back, a concealed zip in one side and a seam at the waist. Lined.
Ballet pumps with an adjustable fastening over the foot. Satin linings and insoles and rubber soles.

Shirt jacket in a wool blend with a collar, covered button placket down the front and yoke at the back. Two chest pockets, two flap front pockets with a press-stud and long, viscose lined sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Fitted, off-the-shoulder top in soft cotton jersey with a ribbed trim at the top and long sleeves.
Cropped T-shirt in jersey with a chest pocket and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Knee-length dress in woven fabric with a boat neck, 3/4-length sleeves with a slit and button at the cuffs, and a detachable tie belt at the waist.
Baby Exclusive. Knee socks in a soft, jacquard-knit cotton blend with elasticated, scallop-edged tops. The cotton content of the socks is organic.

Rain jacket in wind- and waterproof functional fabric with closed seams and a detachable, pile-lined hood. Zip down the front, flap front pockets with a press-stud, elastication at the cuffs and a single back vent. Pile lining.
Sleeveless dress in printed cotton jersey with a gathered seam at the waist and flared skirt.
KIDS EXCLUSIVE. T-shirts in soft, organic cotton jersey with a button placket.

Lined sports bralette in fast-drying functional fabric with wide elastication at the hem. Light support. The bralette is designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.

Dress in a patterned modal weave with a round neckline that has gathers at the front and a small opening with a button at the back of the neck. Long sleeves with elastication at the cuffs, and a seam at the waist with a decorative bow. Unlined.
Mules with open toes, leather linings and insoles, and covered heels approx. 2.5 cm.
KIDS EXCLUSIVE. Sleeveless dress in lightweight, organic, slub cotton sweatshirt fabric with spaghetti shoulder straps and gathered tiers. Unlined.
V-neck maxi dress in softly draping satin with short, flounced sleeves and a concealed zip at the back. Seam at the waist and a wide wrapover skirt with high slits in the sides. Lined at the top.
Straight-cut jersey top with a V-neck and short balloon sleeves with ribbed trims.
Trousers in an airy weave with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, fake front pockets and a fake back pocket with a flap and button. Legs that can be rolled up with a tab and button.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a high cut at the back.
Hand-made, oversized coat in a felted wool blend with a collar, covered press-studs down the front, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and diagonal front pockets. Unlined.
Slightly shorter jumper in a soft, rib-knit cashmere blend with gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves and wide ribbing at the cuffs.

Calf-length dress in embroidered mesh with a smocked, frilled collar and opening with buttons at the back of the neck. Long raglan sleeves with wide, smocked cuffs and a smocked seam with a frill trim at the waist. V-neck underdress in airy jersey with adjustable spaghetti shoulder straps.
Fabric belt with an adjustable metal buckle. Width 3 cm.
Skirt in a cotton weave with broderie anglaise and an elasticated waist. Lined.
Gently tailored jacket in a stretch weave with welt front pockets, a hook-and-eye fastening, and slits at the cuffs. Lined.

Set with a dress in velour made from a cotton blend and a pair of leggings and hairband in patterned cotton jersey. Dress with a press-stud on each shoulder (except in sizes 3-4Y), a gathered seam at the waist for soft draping, sleeves with turn-ups, and heart-shaped pockets on the skirt. Leggings with covered elastication at the waist. Hairband with a sewn-in knot at the front.

Long, sleeveless dress in pleated jersey. Round neckline and an opening with a decorative bar-shaped metal bead at the back of the neck. Narrow elasticated seam and a detachable tie belt at the waist, and a raw-edge hem.
Shirt in a washed linen and cotton blend with a button-down collar, classic front and yoke at the back. Chest pockets with a button, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Scarf in a patterned cotton weave.
Long-sleeved top in soft jersey with a print motif on the front and ties at the hem.
Cargo trousers in a stretch cotton weave with a regular waist, zip fly and button and slim legs, Diagonal side pockets, welt back pockets with a flap, and leg pockets with a pleat and flap.
Long-sleeved top in cotton jersey with a reversible sequin motif on the front (sizes 1½-4Y with normal sequins). Slightly longer at the back with a gently rounded hem.
Leggings in soft organic cotton jersey with wide, foldover ribbing at the waist.
Straight-cut jacket in woven fabric with a shawl collar, thin shoulder pads, welt front pockets and 3/4-length sleeves with a short slit at the cuffs. No fasteners. Lined.
Fitted, knee-length dress in ribbed jersey with narrow, rounded shoulder straps.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with elastication and a concealed drawstring at the waist. Print motif and reflective details on the legs.
Blouse in an airy viscose weave with a wide neckline, elastication and a flounce with broderie anglaise at the top, and a smocked hem.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit with a ribbed polo neck and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Padded all-in-one suit in water-repellent functional fabric with a detachable, faux fur-trimmed, padded hood. Zip down the front with a chin guard, elastication at the back and reinforced sections at the back and knees. Small zipped pocket at the top, and covered elastication at the cuffs and hems. Reflective details. Fleece lining. The suit has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Trousers in a fine jacquard knit with covered elastication at the waist, side pockets and tapered legs with contrasting colour stripes down the sides.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
